text: Nicholas or Nick Wright may refer to: ==Sports== * Nicholas Wright (cricketer, born 1960), English cricketer * Nicholas Wright (cricketer, born 1901) (1901–1974), English cricketer * Nick Wright (footballer, born 1975), English footballer * Nick Wright (footballer, born 1987), English footballer * Nick Wright (sports personality), sports radio and television personality ==Other people== * Nicholas Wright (academic) (born 1945), English academic * Nicholas Wright (playwright) (born 1940), British dramatist * Nicolas Wright (born 1982), Canadian actor * Nick Wright (politician), Canadian politician and lawyer * Nick Wright (Royal Navy officer) (born 1949), private secretary to the Princess Royal * N. T. Wright (born 1948), British New Testament scholar and Anglican bishop ==See also== * Phoenix Wright, nicknamed "Nick", fictional character in the game Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney
title: Nicholas Wright
